OD Tube Connection or NPT Female
OD Tube Connection or NPT Female

fields.End Connections: OD Tube Connection or NPT Female
fields.Construction - Locks: Valve lockable using padlock - Full Open, Fully Closed
fields.Material - Needle Material: Forged - ASTM A182 F316L, Stellite Hard Tip
fields.Material - Gland Packing: Flexible graphite with Braided (Non asbestos, yarn reinforced with Inconel, corrosion inhibitor), Renewable
fields.Material - Lever / Handwheel: Solid ASTM A47 HDG/ ASTM A220 HDG/ SS316
fields.Material - Gaskets: ASME B 16.20, OCT ring of SS316L with Max. Hardness of 160 BHN
fields.Material - Bolts: ASTM A 320 Gr. L7M, XYLAR 2 + XYLAN 1070 coated with minimum combined thickness of 50μm
fields.Material - Nuts: ASTM A 194 Gr. 7ML, XYLAR 2 + XYLAN 1070 coated with minimum combined thickness of 50μm
fields.Marking - Purchaser’s Specification: Hard marked with Valve Type on a stainless steel label, attached using tamper resistant stainless steel fastener, and with Unique Valve Tag Number
fields.Material Certification: Pressure Retaining Parts EN 10204 3.2, Other parts EN 10204 3.1
fields.Fire Rating: API 607 / ISO 10497 (For Floating Ball Valve), API 6FA (For Trunnion Ball Valve)
fields.Finish: General Specification for Paint and Protective Coating doc : 50502-SPE-80000-ME-SP-XXXX
